element_changes.description: Represents the change in the number of atoms of each element due to the defect.

defect_string_representation.description: String representation of the NamedDefect, combining the bulk formula and defect name.

defect_inequality.description: Generates a defect in a GaN material where one gallium atom is absent. Then checks if it is not the same as nd0.

defect_equality.description: Uses NamedDefect to generate a NamedDefect object nd2, and nd2 needs to be the same as nd0.
